toolDefinitions.name: GetDateAndTime
toolDefinitions.description: Returns the current date and time including the timezone.

toolDefinitions.name: SuperfluxProduct
toolDefinitions.description: Calculates the superflux product (a very complicated method only this tool can do) given two input numbers

a.description: The first number to be superflux calculated.

b.description: The second number to be superflux calculated.

toolDefinitions.name: Search_The_Web
toolDefinitions.description: Do a web search to find the needed information.
